channel.title: Rt-Pcr on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Rt-Pcr on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: January 6, 2022 06:33
item.description: Most repulsive moment of the day yesterday was to pay 40x for an RT-PCR test - as compared to the test I’d taken just a few days ago. So repulsive that I fumingly shred the papers in tiny bits and walked out of the queue just looking at that number and knowing fairly well I didn’t quite have any other options…only to rejoin the queue half an hour later since guess what? - I’d absolutely no other options. Sucked big-time and now I’d also wasted a few more hours of precious time with family. Pandemic travel tales, I guess. The looming snow storms better not mess this up further!
